summary:
In the past years I have been working on several projects in the Oil and Gas and Renewable Industry. Projects executed were on both, onshore and offshore locations. The range of projects have great diversity in volume and complexity, but always challenging and working together with the client to get the best project results. Some examples of (recent) projects are:

- 2019/2020 EPC contract for a Jack-up Outrigger that will be used for Offshore pile installation of the Turtue Hub project in Senegal waters
- 2019 EPC contract for an Anode Cage Installation Aid that will be used for installation of Anode Cages in the Kriegers Flak Field.
- 2016/2018 EPC contract for CTCI-CB&I joint venture (CCJV) for two (2) Flare packages for the LIWA Plastics Project in Oman consisting of one (1) Retractable flare system of 160 meters height and  one (1) Retractable flare system of 100 meters height c/w Liquid Seal Drums and ignition systems and related auxileries.
-2016 Offshore Commisioning activities in Equatorial Guinea for the ALBA extension project Fuel gas skid for Marathon Oil Company 
-2015 New Flare tip for the GOP flare of Kuwait Petroleum Europoort, The Netherlands
-2015 Engineering and Fabrication of Flare Seal Drum Internal for Daelim/Petrofac JV for the SRIP-project in Oman 
-2015 Construction Management ALBA extension project Fuel gas skid for Marathon Oil Company 
-2013 - 2015 EPIC flare project for 8 Guy wired flare packages at Qatar Petroleum. 
-2013 Rental project of multiple strandjack lifting system for offshore platform installation
-2013 Transport of 600Te Sludgecatcher from Willebroek to Bergermeer.
-2012 Replacement of the SRU-flare (retractable) on the refinery of ISLA Curacao (PDVSA)
-2012 Flare tip change out on the FPSO Aker Dhirubai, using alternative lifting equipment in India.
-2012 Replacement of Flare tip and heat shield on the FPSO Total Girassol in Angola.
-2011 Flare maintenance project of two flares at ORL in Israël.
-2011 Flare maintenance project of the LHC-1 flare at Dow Terneuzen.
-2010 Replacement of a structured flare stack at the Valero refinery in Aruba
-2010 Maintenace project on the refinery of SRC in Singapore 
-2009 Flare maintenance project at the refinery of ISLA Curacao (PDVSA).
